https://augm-d4b3c.firebaseapp.com/augm.html
https://muse-b90e1.firebaseapp.com/muse.html
https://main-4a9c7.firebaseapp.com/main.html


main: Local server: http://localhost:5000
augm: Local server: http://localhost:5005
muse: Local server: http://localhost:5006


 PWAs are:
    Fast, quickly responding to user interactions.
    Reliable, being capable of working with non optimal network conditions or no network at all.
    Integrated, offering a seamless experience in the OS.
    Engaging, with a beautiful design and using notifications.
